items.sentence: I hope we can put that behind us and move on.
I still hope to visit Australia before I die.
I spend a lot of time doing things like this.
I hope that this is enough food for everyone.
Love doesn't guarantee a successful marriage.
Could you help me translate that into French?
I know I didn't do what I was supposed to do.
I know doing this must seem dangerous to you.
I didn't know you were married to each other.
Do you really not know how to turn on a lamp?
I just got fined for riding without a helmet.
Do you know what time the flower shop closes?
From the outset I was prepared for the worst.
Tom loves Mary, but the feeling isn't mutual.
I'm not interested in doing that, but Tom is.
I didn't know Tom used to be married to Mary.
I didn't know Tom wasn't paid for doing that.
Tom doesn't have to do that. Mary will do it.
Have you seen my cell phone? I can't find it.
Be sure to hand in your homework by tomorrow.
